div.span: OK2SAY is a program designed to empower students, parents, school personnel, community mental health service programs, and law enforcement to share and respond to student safety threats.
Great things happen in Marysville Schools!
Do you know someone who has done something “Great” in or for Marysville Public Schools? We would like to hear about it.

div.p: This is the approved Continuity of Learning Plan for Marysville Public Schools during the Coronavirus. The Plan's implementation date is Tuesday, April 21, 2020, and will conclude Friday, June 12, 2020.

span.a: PDF File MPS Continuity of Learning Plan (approved)

div.p: Marysville Public Schools is committed to preparing our students for continued success after High School. We do this by offering high quality and comprehensive curriculum at all grade levels. The link below will take you to a website that will highlight the Multi-Tiered Systems of Support that is provided in the Marysville School District.

div.a: Marysville Public Schools Multi Tiered Systems of Support website link:

div.p: It is the policy of the Board of Education (“Board”) of Marysville Public Schools (“District”) to ensure that online content provided through the District’s website(s) is accessible to students, prospective students, employees, guests, and visitors with disabilities, particularly those with visual, hearing, or manual impairments, or who otherwise require the use of assistive technology to access information. For more information about the District’s Website Accessibility Policy (No. 9960).
